snippet: In a separate development, Fox News announced that Greta Van Susteren was leaving the network, effective immediately....
abstract: Fox News announces abrupt departure of long-serving host Greta Van Susteren, in unsettling sign of upheaval at once proudly defiant network; Susteren's departure follows $20 million settlement in sexual harassment case brought by former anchor Gretchen Carlson against Chairman Roger Ailes and precedes expiration of contracts for several key Fox News figures, fueling rumors of pending high turnover at network.

byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and JOHN KOBLIN

lead_paragraph: In a separate development, Fox News announced that Greta Van Susteren was leaving the network, effective immediately.

headline.main: Fox Settles With Gretchen Carlson Over Roger Ailes Sex Harassment Claims
headline.print_headline: Fox Settles Sex Harassment Suit as Another Host Abruptly Exits
